items.title: Coaching the Analytical Mind: Best Practices of Fortune 500

visible_instructors.name: Dr. Gleb
visible_instructors.title: Dr. Gleb Tsipursky, PhD
visible_instructors.job_title: Globally-Renowned Behavioral Science Trainer for Fortune 500

items.headline: Master best practices on coaching analytically minded clients from Fortune 500 firms taught by globally-renowned expert
objectives_summary: Identify how to solve typical challenges experienced by coaches in dealing with analytical clients at Fortune 500 firms and elsewhere
Master emotional and social intelligence research-based tools to connect with and coach analytically minded clients
Develop a plan with specific next steps to adapt for yourself the best practices on coaching analytically minded clients tested at Fortune 500 firms

items.title: Master Unconscious Bias: Best Practices of Fortune 500 Firms

visible_instructors.name: Dr. Gleb
visible_instructors.title: Dr. Gleb Tsipursky, PhD
visible_instructors.job_title: Globally-Renowned Behavioral Science Trainer for Fortune 500

items.headline: Discover how Fortune 500 firms master unconscious bias to make wise people decisions taught by globally-famous expert
objectives_summary: Master the best practices in overcoming unconscious bias to make the best people decisions used by Fortune 500 firms to seize competitive advantage
Feel truly confident about whether you and your team recognized unconscious bias and defeated it to make the right calls on your decision making about people
Develop a plan with clear next steps to adapt for yourself the methods used by Fortune 500 firms to overcome unconscious bias and make the best people decisions

items.title: Free Outsourcing Course - Rediscover Your Freedom And Thrive

Delegate tasks effectively, ensuring consistent quality task results.
